function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased risk of contagion due to face-to-face contact in food service industry","Impact":"Potential for rapid spread of contagious diseases among customers and staff","Mitigation":"Implementing contactless delivery, enforcing strict hygiene and safety standards, and reducing in-person interactions","Technologies":"Contactless delivery technology, hygiene monitoring systems, and digital ordering platforms","People":"Customers, staff, and other stakeholders in the food service industry","Owner":"Food service businesses and regulatory authorities"},{"Description":"Risk of decreased customer confidence in banking services","Impact":"Loss of trust and confidence in the competence of banking service providers","Mitigation":"Emphasizing digital security measures, providing transparent communication, and offering personalized customer support","Technologies":"Enhanced digital security systems, transparent communication platforms, and personalized customer service tools","People":"Customers and staff in the banking industry","Owner":"Banks and financial institutions"}]}
